fields.name: Tear of the Goddess (Crystal Scar)
fields.description: +250 Mana +25% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants 5 maximum Mana on spell cast or Mana expenditure (up to 2 times per 6 seconds). Grants 1 maximum Mana every 6 seconds. Caps at +750 Mana. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
